Method Detail

stopSessionBean

void stopSessionBean()
Calling this function signals the container to remove this bean instance and terminates the session.

login

User login(java.lang.String userName,
           java.lang.String password)
           throws ExternalSystemException,
                  LoginException
Authenticates the user and binds the User instance to the context of this stateful session bean. All other methods will use the bound User instance for authorizing operations.

Parameters:
username -
password -
Returns:
an instance of User, with roles & rights collections initialized.
Throws:
ExternalSystemException
LoginException
